trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) brands you a heretic for your crimes against the Light\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_heretic__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) calls down a beam of brilliant light upon you\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_judgement_start__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) chants and a column of topaz light appears before [hH](?:im|er)\. (?:Sh|H)e points at you and the column of light obediently moves to envelop you\, a voice whispering in your mind that you will be judged\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_judgement_continue__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) marks you as an infidel for your utter contempt for the Light\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_infidel__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) calls down an inquisition upon you\, and a pillar of holy fire strikes you from the heavens\. A bright pain streaks through your body but you cannot move or even cry out in agony\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_inquisition__

trigger.match: ^The pain of ritualistic inquisition subdues your actions\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_inquisition_symptom__

trigger.match: ^You feel yourself released from the painful inquisition\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_inquisition_done__

trigger.match: ^A cloudy vision forms in your mind\'s eye of a towering\, angelic woman with a cobalt blue shield who shouts\, "Heretic\, get thee from the Light\!" She points at you and a bolt of blue lightning slams into you\.$
trigger.name: sacraments_heretic_tick__
